trans-unit.source: Represents the set of arguments passed to the notification event handler.
trans-unit.target: 代表引數傳遞至通知的事件處理常式集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType"></xref> value that indicates whether this notification is generated because of an actual change, or by the subscription.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType"></xref>值，指出是否因為實際的變更，而產生此通知或訂用帳戶。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo"></xref> value that indicates the reason for the notification event.
This may occur because the data in the store actually changed, or the notification became invalid (for example, it timed out).
trans-unit.target: 這可能是因為在存放區中的資料實際上已變更，或告知變得無效 （例如，它已逾時）。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationSource"></xref> value that indicates the source that generated the notification.
Gets a value that indicates the reason for the notification event, such as a row in the database being modified or a table being truncated.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出通知事件，例如在有所修改的資料庫或截斷資料表的資料列的原因。

trans-unit.source: This event may occur because the data in the store actually changed, or the notification is no longer valid (for example, it timed out).
trans-unit.target: 因為存放區中的資料實際上已變更，或通知已不再有效 （例如，它已逾時），可能會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the source that generated the notification, such as a change to the query data or the database’s state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出產生的通知，例如查詢資料或資料庫的狀態變更的來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this notification is generated because of an actual change, or by the subscription.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否因為實際的變更，而產生此通知或訂用帳戶。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the notification was generated by a change or a subscription.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出是否由訂用帳戶或變更所產生的通知。
